course.title: Philosophy of Law
course.description: We will look at moral issues relating to the law, especially U.S. constitutional law. Readings will include important recent and historical court cases alongside philosophical work. Topics to be discussed include the role of judges in a democracy, race and gender equality, freedom of speech, and the rule of law. For example, should judges have such a large voice on the regulation of abortion? Should corporations be allowed to spend unlimited amounts supporting political candidates? And can we put restrictions on violent pornography while respecting freedom of speech?
